entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
